languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс склоняется над вами с кривой ухмылкой.{/n} "Вольный Торговец, с вами все в порядке? Или же {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}еретическая связь с ксеносами{/d} на вас столь пагубно влияет, что вы повредились рассудком?" {n}Сквозь издевательские слова просачивается раздражение — дознаватель явно недоволен тем, куда повернул разговор.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс склоняется над вами с кривой ухмылкой.{/n} "Вольный Торговец, с вами все в порядке? Или же еретическая связь с ксеносами на вас столь пагубно влияет, что вы помутнились рассудком?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix bends over you with a crooked smile.{/n} "Rogue Trader, are you all right? Or was your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}heretical association with xenos{/d} so disruptive that you lost your mind?" {n}The mocking words do little to hide his irritation. The Interrogator is obviously displeased with the turn the conversation is taking.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс склоняется над вами с кривой ухмылкой.{/n} "Вольный Торговец, с вами все в порядке? Или же {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}еретическая связь с ксеносами{/d} на вас столь пагубно влияет, что вы повредились рассудком?" {n}Сквозь издевательские слова просачивается раздражение — дознаватель явно недоволен тем, куда повернул разговор.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix bends over you with a crooked smile.{/n} "Rogue Trader, are you all right? Or was your heretical association with xenos so disruptive that you lost your mind?" {n}The mocking words do little to hide his irritation, the Interrogator is obviously unhappy with the direction the conversation is taking.{/n}

{n}Heinrix bends over you with a crooked smile.{/n} "Rogue Trader, are you all right? Or was your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}heretical association with xenos{/d} so disruptive that you lost your mind?" {n}The mocking words do little to hide his irritation. The Interrogator is obviously displeased with the turn the conversation is taking.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se penche sur vous avec un rictus aux lèvres.{/n} « Tout va bien, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Ou bien votre {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}association impie avec les xénos{/d} a-t-elle fini par vous faire perdre la tête ? » {n}Les mots railleurs dissimulent mal son agacement. L'interrogateur n'est manifestement pas satisfait de la tournure que prend la conversation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over you with a crooked smile.{/n} "Rogue Trader, are you all right? Or was your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}heretical association with xenos{/d} so disruptive that you lost your mind?" {n}The mocking words do little to hide his irritation. The Interrogator is obviously displeased with the turn the conversation is taking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se penche sur vous avec un rictus aux lèvres.{/n} « Tout va bien, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Ou bien est-ce votre association avec les xénos qui a fini par vous faire perdre la tête ? » {n}Les mots railleurs dissimulent mal son agacement. L'interrogateur n'est manifestement pas satisfait de la tournure que prend la conversation.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希朝你靠了过来，露出了恶意的笑容。{/n}“你没事吧，行商浪人？莫非{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}你和那些异形关系过于亲密{/d}，让你失去了理智？”{n}即便是这些充满嘲弄意味的话语，也无法掩饰他的愤怒。很显然，这位审讯官对这样的答复很是不满。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over you with a crooked smile.{/n} "Rogue Trader, are you all right? Or was your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}heretical association with xenos{/d} so disruptive that you lost your mind?" {n}The mocking words do little to hide his irritation. The Interrogator is obviously displeased with the turn the conversation is taking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希朝你靠了过来，露出了恶意的笑容。{/n}“你没事吧，行商浪人？莫非你和那些异形关系过于亲密，让你失去了理智？”{n}即便是这些充满嘲弄意味的话语，也无法掩饰他的愤怒。很显然，这位审讯官对这样的答复很不满意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、歪んだ笑みを浮かべながら、あなたの上にかがみ込んだ。{/n}「自由開拓者よ、大丈夫か？それとも、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}異種族との異端的な交流{/d}のせいで、正気を失ったのかね？」{n}嘲るようなその言葉にも、彼の苛立ちを隠す効果はない。インテロゲイターは明らかに会話の展開に不満を抱いている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over you with a crooked smile.{/n} "Rogue Trader, are you all right? Or was your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}heretical association with xenos{/d} so disruptive that you lost your mind?" {n}The mocking words do little to hide his irritation. The Interrogator is obviously displeased with the turn the conversation is taking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、歪んだ笑みを浮かべながら、あなたの上にかがみ込んだ。{/n}「自由開拓者よ、大丈夫か？それとも、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}異種族との異端的な交流{/d}のせいで、正気を失ったのかね？」{n}嘲るようなその言葉にも、彼の苛立ちを隠す効果はない。インテロゲイターは明らかに会話の展開に不満を抱いている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix beugt sich über dich und lächelt dabei schief.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, geht es Euch gut? Oder hat Euch Eurer {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}ketzerischer Zusammenschluss mit den Xenos{/d} so verstört, dass Ihr den Verstand verloren habt?" {n}Die spöttische Bemerkung verbirgt seine Verärgerung nicht wirklich. Der Interrogator ist offensichtlich nicht erfreut, wie das Gespräch mittlerweile verläuft.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over you with a crooked smile.{/n} "Rogue Trader, are you all right? Or was your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}heretical association with xenos{/d} so disruptive that you lost your mind?" {n}The mocking words do little to hide his irritation. The Interrogator is obviously displeased with the turn the conversation is taking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix beugt sich über dich und lächelt dabei schief.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, geht es Euch gut? Oder hat Euch Eurer ketzerischer Zusammenschluss mit den Xenos so verstört, dass Ihr den Verstand verloren habt?" {n}Die spöttische Bemerkung verbirgt seine Verärgerung nicht wirklich. Der Interrogator ist offensichtlich unglücklich, wie das Gespräch mittlerweile verläuft.{/n}

{n}Heinrix beugt sich über dich und lächelt dabei schief.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, geht es Euch gut? Oder hat Euch Eurer ketzerischer Zusammenschluss mit den Xenos so verstört, dass Ihr den Verstand verloren habt?" {n}Die spöttische Bemerkung verbirgt seine Verärgerung nicht wirklich. Der Interrogator ist offensichtlich nicht erfreut, wie das Gespräch mittlerweile verläuft.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se inclina hacia ti con una sonrisa maliciosa.{/n} «¿Se encuentra usted bien, Comerciante Independiente? ¿O {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}quizá confraternizar con los xenos{/d} le ha trastornado la mente?». {n}Su tono burlón no oculta en absoluto su irritación. Es evidente que el interrogador no está nada satisfecho con el giro que ha dado la conversación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over you with a crooked smile.{/n} "Rogue Trader, are you all right? Or was your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}heretical association with xenos{/d} so disruptive that you lost your mind?" {n}The mocking words do little to hide his irritation. The Interrogator is obviously displeased with the turn the conversation is taking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se inclina hacia ti con una sonrisa maliciosa.{/n} «¿Se encuentra usted bien, Comerciante Independiente? ¿O quizá confraternizar con los xenos le ha trastornado la mente?». {n}Su tono burlón no oculta en absoluto su irritación. Es evidente que el interrogador no está contento con el giro que ha dado la conversación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, zoraki bir gülümsemeyle sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, iyi misin? Yoksa {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}zenolarla kurduğun kâfirce ilişkiler{/d} yüzünden aklını mı yitirdin?" {n}Alaycı sözleri, duyduğu tiksintiyi pek gizleyemiyor. Sorgucu'nun konuşmanın gittiği yönden hoşnut olmadığı çok belli.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over you with a crooked smile.{/n} "Rogue Trader, are you all right? Or was your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}heretical association with xenos{/d} so disruptive that you lost your mind?" {n}The mocking words do little to hide his irritation. The Interrogator is obviously displeased with the turn the conversation is taking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix zoraki bir gülümsemeyle sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, iyi misin? Yoksa zenolarla kâfirce bir ilişki içinde oluşun seni çok rahatsız etti de aklını mı yitirdin?" {n}Alaycı sözleri duyduğu tiksintiyi pek gizleyemiyor. Sorgucu'nun konuşmanın gittiği yönden hoşnut olmadığı çok belli.{/n}
